item_page.title: Item Overview Page
item_page.intro_paragraph_1: Here you can shop and go! Our store is dedicated to bringing you convenience and simplicity, whether you're looking for daily essentials or a special treat. With a curated selection of top-quality products, we aim to make your shopping experience quick, easy, and enjoyable.
item_page.intro_paragraph_2: At Shop & Go, we believe in saving you time without compromising on quality. We pride ourselves on excellent service, unbeatable value, and a hassle-free experience every time you visit. Come explore a new way to shop!

errors.missingId: Item id is missing in form

CookiePolicy.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By accepting, you agree to our use of cookies.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. It is Shop & Go's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, <0>http://www.shopandgo.com</0>, and other platforms we operate.
PrivacyPolicy.overview: Shop & Go is designed to make your supermarket visits more convenient. To achieve this, we may collect and use certain personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle, store, and protect that data.
PrivacyPolicy.collectDetails: We only request personal information when it is necessary to provide a specific service to you, such as:
collectPoints: Your name, email address, or other contact details for account creation.
Your shopping preferences, lists, and location data to suggest the best routes and stores near you.
Feedback, queries, or communication to improve our services.
PrivacyPolicy.consentNotice: All data collection is performed with your consent, and you will be informed about why the information is needed and how it will be used.
PrivacyPolicy.useDetails: The personal data we collect is used to:
usePoints: Enhance your planning experience by customizing recommendations.
Optimize your supermarket visits based on your preferences and location.
Communicate important updates or respond to your queries.
PrivacyPolicy.storageNotice: We only retain your information for as long as necessary to provide these services. Stored data is safeguarded using industry-standard practices to prevent unauthorized access, theft, or misuse.
PrivacyPolicy.thirdPartyNotice: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless it is required by law or necessary to provide the services you request. For instance, location data may be used with mapping services to identify the nearest supermarkets.
PrivacyPolicy.externalLinks: Our website may contain links to external sites not operated by Shop & Go. Please be aware that we are not responsible for the content, practices, or privacy policies of these external sites.
PrivacyPolicy.rightsDetails: You have the right to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that this may limit some functionalities of Shop & Go. For example, personalized supermarket suggestions may not be available.
PrivacyPolicy.rightsActions: You may also request to view, update, or delete the personal data we have collected about you. Please contact us at <0>privacy@shopandgo.com</0> for assistance with any privacy-related concerns.
PrivacyPolicy.revokeConsent: At any point you can choose to <0>revoke</0> your consent for data collection and use.
PrivacyPolicy.updateNotice: This Privacy Policy is effective as of 18/12/2024. We may update it from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or relevant laws. Any updates will be communicated through our website.
PrivacyPolicy.agreementNotice: By continuing to use Shop & Go, you agree to our Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us at <0>support@shopandgo.com</0>.
